description: The Windflower (Anemone hybrida 'Pretty Lady Diana') is an amazing perennial flower with delicate blooms of pure white petals and a golden center. The flowers are the perfect addition to any garden, as they are hardy and can thrive in a variety of climates. Throughout the summer, they will provide continuously blooming clusters of vibrantly contrasting color. The blooms make excellent cut flowers when they are in full bloom. Not only are they eye-catching and long-lasting, theyâ€™re also a source of food for pollinators like bees, butterflies and hummingbirds. And, thanks to its large and deep root system, it also prevents soil erosion. With its captivating blooms and low maintenance requirements, Windflower is an ideal choice for bringing beauty and life to any garden.
